title: Bulk Update Website Meta Titles
description: An SEO specialist wants to update the meta titles for all product pages to a new, standardized format.

tasks.description: Define the new meta title format (e.g., '[Product Name] | [Category] | [Brand Name]').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a clear template for the new titles.

tasks.description: Pull a list of all product pages with their current titles, names, and categories.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of all products needing an update.

tasks.description: Run a script to programmatically generate the new titles based on the template and apply the changes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates all product page titles to the new format.
